iss: The International Space Station (ISS) is a large, multinational space LABORATORY
LOW Earth ORBIT that has been continuously crewed since 2000
It serves as a unique platform for scientific research in microgravity, which includes BIOLOGY, PHYSICS, and ASTRONOMY
Human health: Researchers study the effects of space on the HUMAN body, including the development of DISEASES that resemble those on Earth.
SOLAR panels provide POWER for the station, which runs on Greenwich Mean Time
